seo.title: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Kitchen & Cookware Stores (2026)
seo.meta_description: Home cooks and chefs expect fast, trustworthy stores. See how 27 Shopify kitchen & cookware stores perform on pagespeed score. Median: 53, Top 10%: 63. Free benchmarks.
keywords: best pagespeed score for kitchen stores
how to improve pagespeed score shopify

key_findings: The average Kitchen & Cookware store scores 53 on PageSpeed, in the "needs improvement" range
Top 10% of stores achieve scores of 63+, giving them a significant competitive advantage
There's a 22 point gap between top and bottom performers in this niche
Some stores in this niche fall below Google's minimum acceptable threshold
Source: Boostra analysis of 27 Shopify kitchen & cookware stores, 2026-01-04.
how_to_improve: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight
Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets
Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code
Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store
Minimize main-thread work by deferring non-critical JavaScript
Reduce the impact of third-party scripts like analytics and chat widgets
Consider a performance-focused Shopify theme if your current theme is bloated

jsonld.name: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Kitchen & Cookware Stores
jsonld.description: Performance benchmark data for 27 Shopify stores in the kitchen and home industry, measuring pagespeed score.

acceptedAnswer.text: PageSpeed Score is Google's comprehensive performance metric (0-100) that evaluates your site's speed and user experience. Higher scores correlate with better SEO rankings and conversion rates.

mainEntity.name: Why does PageSpeed Score matter for kitchen & cookware stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: PageSpeed Score is Google's comprehensive performance metric (0-100) that evaluates your site's speed and user experience. Higher scores correlate with better SEO rankings and conversion rates. Scores of 90+ are considered 'good', 50-89 'needs improvement', and below 50 'poor'.

mainEntity.name: What is a good PageSpeed Score for Shopify kitchen & cookware stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Based on Boostra's analysis of 27 Shopify kitchen & cookware stores, the median pagespeed score is 53. Top-performing stores in this niche (top 10%) achieve 63. Scores of 90+ are considered 'good', 50-89 'needs improvement', and below 50 'poor'.

mainEntity.name: How can I improve my kitchen & cookware store's PageSpeed Score?

acceptedAnswer.text: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight. Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets. Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code. Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store. For a personalized analysis of your store's specific issues and opportunities, consider a professional CRO audit.

mainEntity.name: How does my store compare to other kitchen & cookware stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can compare your pagespeed score against our benchmarks. If your score is better than 53 (the median), you're in the top half of kitchen & cookware stores. If you're better than 63, you're among the top 10% performers in your industry.
